Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A resolution reported relating to the authorizing of variable rate mortgages by the Federal Home Loan Bank Board.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Federal Home Loan Bank Board shall refrain from authorizing a Federal savings and loan association to offer loans with variable interest rates and secured by one - to four family homes or dwelling units unless authorized by Congress.

titles.title: A resolution reported relating to the authorizing of variable rate mortgages by the Federal Home Loan Bank Board.
